title: Google Calendar + SendGrid Email Triggers
description: Triggered upon inquiry and document upload completion. Adds event to admin calendar and sends operational instruction emails to admin & consumer.

title: Documentation Enforcement Engine
description: No payments accepted until full document set uploaded. Validates audit type requirements and blocks Stripe/PayPal until server-side check returns 'complete'.

title: Per-Audit Document Checklist Engine
description: Document requirements per audit type: credit card, utilities, cell phone, internet, garbage, mortgage, promissory, servicing audits.

title: Tiered AI Validation System
description: OCR, legal triggers, consensus confidence (3-model agreement) before PDF/CFPB/agency notification. Admin override/logs in /admin/validation-log.

title: UCC Tracking System (Articles 2 & 9)
description: Contract dispute audits, secured loan lien reviews, county/state-level logic flagging.

title: Legal Violation Explainer System
description: /consumer/violations page with code citations, layman breakdown, action history, and QR trace logs.

title: Contract & Agreement Flowchart Module
description: Agreements for real estate, employment, partnership, vendor. Summarizes clauses and builds flowcharts with deadlines, steps, risk tags.

title: Full CFPB/State/County Reporting Automation
description: Ties audit results to jurisdiction, auto-generates complaint packets, timestamps, embeds QR in PDF.

title: Zadarma CRM + PBX Integration
description: Call routing, consumer call history logs, voicemail transcription to MongoDB.

title: Partner Referral Disclosure + Agreements
description: MOU for nonprofits, CPA, NMLS, escrow officers, role-based access control, commission logs.

title: Admin Legal Vault
description: Add/edit audit logic, CFPB state routing override, UCC editor, AI rule toggles.

title: Business Loan + Factoring + P.O. Audits
description: Mexico cross-border loan tracking, referral flow to business lending partners, disclosure and documentation enforcement included.
